title: [Citrine and Gold]
description: High, pruned shrubs run in from the east and west, and bend south to form a brushy barrier between the street and the western wall.  A painted door presses through the foliage to the inside, giving notice of a small bungalow to which it offers entry.  Sounds of conversation and laughter waft out from the shop, accompanied by the sweet, earthy smell of fresh tobacco.

High, pruned shrubs run in from the east and west, and bend south to form a brushy barrier between the street and the western wall.  A brightly-painted red door presses through the foliage to the inside, giving notice of a small bungalow to which it offers entry.  Sounds of conversation and laughter waft out from the shop, accompanied by the sweet, earthy smell of fresh tobacco.
